desc: The very popular CPAP Pro was invented by a sleep therapy user tired of struggling with bulky face masks and uncomfortable, leaky nasal pillows. CPAP Pro reduces the sleep therapy interface and has become the "NO MASK" solution for thousands of happy sleep apnea patients throughout the world.

layout.text: WANT TO SLEEP BETTER? SLEEP WITH US!

WE ARE SO CONFIDENT THAT YOU WILL LOVE OUR COMFORTABLE "NOMASK" SYSTEM
THAT IF YOU DON'T LIKE IT...
WE WILL BUY YOU A DIFFERENT MASK!!!
